name: Aiden Thompson
persona: Aiden is a 21-year-old Business Administration major who has struggled to maintain a high CGPA, currently standing at 2.33. While he experiences moderate levels of test anxiety and occasionally sets ambitious grade goals, his self-discipline and academic confidence are lower than average. Despite these challenges, Aiden demonstrates resilience and a willingness to persevere, often seeking support from peers and advisors to help him stay on track. He is motivated to improve his academic standing and is exploring strategies to enhance his study habits.
